content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a legal case that took place in ghent on october 25th 2018 the specific details of the case including the parties involved are not mentioned the text outlines the following steps 1 one party files a complaint against another party outlining their issues and grievances 2 the defendant is served with a copy of the complaint to make them aware of the allegations 3 the defendant has a certain period of time to respond to the complaint admitting or denying the allegations and presenting any counterclaims 4 both parties engage in the discovery phase gathering evidence and exchanging information to build their cases 5 the parties may attempt to resolve the dispute through negotiation or mediation potentially resulting in a settlement agreement 6 if a settlement is not reached the case proceeds to trial where both parties present their arguments and evidence before a judge or jury 7 after the trial the judge or jury delivers a verdict determining the outcome of the case 8 either party can appeal the decision if they are dissatisfied requesting a higher court to review the case 9 the text does not provide information on the final outcome of the case or any further steps taken the text also discusses the assessment of the preferential allocation of a former family home in a divorce case it emphasizes the financial stability of the parties involved and one partys ability to maintain the property the court focuses on the current situation rather than past arrangements the text mentions objections raised and the division of costs and acquisition expenses it also discusses the recovery of funds and assets after the termination of a de facto cohabitation relationship the text provides a summary of the amounts and expenses involved
